price: Akkanatti Rabbiin keeyyattoota Isaa isiniif addeessa Akka isin xiinxaltaniif.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
